name: material_extraction_swarm
description: Extract materials data from multiple monolith modules in parallel

tasks.prompt:
Generate a JSON array of 10 common aluminum alloys used in CNC machining with these fields for each:
- id (string, format: 'AL-XXXX')
- name (string)
- uns_number (string)
- density_kg_m3 (number)
- tensile_strength_mpa (number)
- hardness_hb (number)
- machinability_rating (number, 0-100)
- thermal_conductivity_w_mk (number)
- typical_applications (array of strings)

Include: 6061-T6, 7075-T6, 2024-T3, 5052-H32, 6063-T5, 7050-T7451, 2011-T3, 6082-T6, 5083-H116, 7475-T7351

Return ONLY valid JSON, no markdown backticks, no explanation.

Generate a JSON array of 10 common steel alloys used in CNC machining with these fields for each:
- id (string, format: 'ST-XXXX')
- name (string)
- aisi_number (string)
- density_kg_m3 (number)
- tensile_strength_mpa (number)
- hardness_hrc (number)
- machinability_rating (number, 0-100)
- carbon_content_percent (number)
- typical_applications (array of strings)

Include: 1018, 1045, 4140, 4340, A2 tool steel, D2 tool steel, O1 tool steel, 316 stainless, 304 stainless, 17-4 PH

Return ONLY valid JSON, no markdown backticks, no explanation.

Generate a JSON array of 5 common titanium alloys used in CNC machining with these fields for each:
- id (string, format: 'TI-XXXX')
- name (string)
- grade (string)
- density_kg_m3 (number)
- tensile_strength_mpa (number)
- hardness_hrc (number)
- machinability_rating (number, 0-100)
- max_service_temp_c (number)
- typical_applications (array of strings)

Include: Ti-6Al-4V (Grade 5), CP Titanium Grade 2, Ti-6Al-4V ELI (Grade 23), Ti-5Al-2.5Sn, Ti-6Al-2Sn-4Zr-2Mo

Return ONLY valid JSON, no markdown backticks, no explanation.

Generate a JSON array of recommended cutting parameters for 5 material categories. Each entry should have:
- material_category (string)
- recommended_tool_material (string)
- cutting_speed_range_m_min (object with min/max)
- feed_per_tooth_range_mm (object with min/max)
- depth_of_cut_range_mm (object with min/max)
- coolant_recommendation (string)
- notes (string)

Categories: Aluminum Alloys, Carbon Steel, Stainless Steel, Titanium Alloys, Tool Steel

Return ONLY valid JSON, no markdown backticks, no explanation.

Generate a JSON array of 6 cutting tool materials with these fields:
- id (string)
- name (string)
- composition (string)
- hardness_hv (number)
- max_cutting_temp_c (number)
- toughness_rating (number, 1-10)
- wear_resistance_rating (number, 1-10)
- cost_rating (number, 1-10, where 10 is most expensive)
- best_for_materials (array of strings)
- avoid_materials (array of strings)

Include: HSS, Carbide (uncoated), Carbide (TiAlN coated), Ceramic, CBN, PCD

Return ONLY valid JSON, no markdown backticks, no explanation.
